title: Aztec Ruins National Monument: Calendar
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Calendar            Calendar         Ranger leading visitors on a tour of an unexcavated site. NPS Photo  Ranger-Guided Tours and Talks Ranger programs are offered daily Memorial Day through Labor Day. These include hour-long ranger-guided tours of Aztec West at 10:00am and shorter kiva talks at 2:00pm. Special Tours and Events Other special tours and events are detailed in the calendar below or on our 2016 Special Events flyer. Change the dates below and click "show results" to search for upcoming events.          Keyword       By Date     Start Date      End Date          Search         Upcoming Events    Showing 3 results    Show ALL instances of recurring events   RSS Feed      Aztec Ruins National Monument Dr. Laurie Webster: Ancient Textiles, Baskets, Wood, and Hides from Southeastern Utah - Latest Findings from the Cedar Mesa Perishables Project      Time: 7:00 PM to 8:30 PM Location: Aztec Ruins National Monument Visitor Center Fees: Free     Friday, August 19, 2016 Presented by Dr. Laurie Webster, Textiles Specialist and Researcher from Mancos, CO.
